Larry and Sergey are 10 years older than they were when they thoughtfully hired Eric Schmidt to be the CEO... so everybody's growing up, Vint Cerf said. Mike Pence will not run for president in 2012. AP Photo/Carlos Osorio Indiana Rep. Mike Pence will not run for president but has left the door open to running for governor of the Hoosier State in 2012. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence said in a Mike Pence has been publicly mulling whether to run for the open governor's office or for president for several months.
